text: Fu Chronicles is the seventh studio album by American band Antibalas. It was released on February 7, 2020 under Daptone In support of the album, the band announced a tour. ==Critical reception== Fu Chronicles was met with generally favorable reviews from critics. At Metacritic, which assigns a weighted average rating out of 100 to reviews from mainstream publications, this release received an average score of 80, based on 4 reviews. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2020 albums Category:Daptone Records albums
title: Fu Chronicles
